attr_Onion_Form: Physical state and presentation of the dehydrated onion product.
attr_Processing_Method: Method used to process the raw onions into dehydrated products.
attr_Onion_Color: Color of the onion used in the dehydrated product.
attr_Mesh_Size: Particle size designation using mesh count.
attr_Quality_Grade: Grading or quality level assigned to the dehydrated onion product.
attr_Organic_Certification: Indication of whether the dehydrated onion product is certified organic.
attr_Origin_Country: Country where the onions were originally grown.
attr_Cut_Size: Size of the cut for chopped, minced, or kibbled onion products.
attr_Irradiation_Status: Indicates whether the dehydrated onion product has been irradiated.
attr_Toasting_Level: Degree to which the onion product has been toasted.
